name: Obelisk of Permafrost
uniques: Comment [As Permafrost spreads, the Obelisk draws power from the frost, granting +1 of each yield per threshold reached — each yield awakens at a different rate.]
Never destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: An ancient spire that hums with frozen energy, the Obelisk of Frost empowers the Frostborne as their dominion of ice expands.

name: Frozen Monolith

civilopediaText.text: Formed through the power of the Obelisk of Permafrost, these lesser monoliths anchor the spreading ice, amplifying the Frostborne’s dominion with each frozen stone raised.
